Articles.Content:
I've looked around the threads, and so far I've not seen anything relating to this.

In .24, the Mk1 Cockpit from C7 Aerospace looked pretty cool, and Squad changed the appearance of the exterior in 0.25.

In my opinion, this isn't a good look for the part, as it now has the large flat windscreen which is much more compact against the craft, and the cheek farings (I'd presume they are intakes for ventilation of computer equipment, but unless that is the case, they don't make aerodynamic sense to me)

The interior still reflects the older canopy, and in personal taste, that is a better look.

just an idea, and a humble request, but if it's not too much trouble, could Squad consider returning the Mk1 to it's older appearance?

Thanks for the consideration. Have a nice day.
